    • Player

      public Player​(processing.core.PImage img, int x, int y, int w, int h, int state, long time)
      Constructor for Player class
      Parameters:
      img - image file for what Player looks like
      x - top left x coordinate of Player
      y - top left y coordinate of Player
      w - width of Player
      h - height of Player
      state - the status of the player
      time - time duration of the game
